title: The Authority Complete +Midnighter+Kev 9-19-08
description:
Here's The Authority, up to date as of Sept 19 2008, in one easy-to-download package.  The Authority was created by Warren Ellis and Bryan Hitch and follows a powerful group of superhumans in the Wildstorm universe.  Wikipedia has a great writeup here (although it thinks vol.4 is vol.3, which it isn't):
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Authority

Included:
The Authority Vol.1: #1-29 (1999)
The Authority Vol.2: #0-14 (2003)
Coup d'Etat mini
The Authority: Revolution #1-12 (Vol.3)
Captain Atom: Armageddon #1-9 (events leading up to the Worldstorm event)
The Authority Vol.4: #1-2 (abandoned 2006 series)
The Authority: Prime mini
Wildstorm Armageddon mini (leading up to the World's End event)
Wildstorm Revelations mini (leading up to the World's End event)
Number of the Beast mini (leading up to the World's End event)
The Authority Vol.5: #1-2 (current 2008 series)

Plus! if you download now you'll also receive!
Secret History of the Authority: Jenny Sparks #1-5
Secret History of the Authority: Hawksmoor #1-6
Devil's Night series including The Authority Annual 2000
The Authority: Scorched Earth (one-shot)
The Authority: Human on the Inside (one-shot)
Planetary & The Authority crossover
both Authority-vs-Lobo crossovers (plus the Lobo holiday special that Jenny reads in Jingle Hell)
Wildstorm Summer Special 2001
Wildstorm Winter Special 2005

But wait-- there's more!  You'll also get the Kev saga -- written by Garth Ennis!
The Authority: Kev
The Authority: More Kev (#1-4)
The Authority: The Magnificent Kevin (#1-5)
A Man Called Kev (#1-5)

And finally, we'll include, at no extra charge, the Midnighter series and his team-up with Grifter:
Midnighter #1-20
Grifter-Midnighter: Uncivil Union


Thanks to the original scanners!  Seed for all you're worth!
